mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE(MES_NO, MES_CON, SEND_ID, RECV_ID) VALUES((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MES_NO)+1 FROM MESSAGE),#{mes_con},#{send_id},#{recv_id})
mapper.select: select mes_no, mes_con, read_check, send_id, recv_id from message where recv_id=#{recv_id} and isshow='Y' ORDER BY wdate desc
select mes_no, mes_con, wdate, read_check, send_id from message where mes_no = #{mes_no}
mapper.update: update message set isshow='N' where send_id=#{send_id} and mes_no=#{mes_no}
